name: Vader's Bionic Limbs
Lore: 'Darth Vader often used physical means of ''persuasion'' to get information. Captain Antilles of Tantive IV chose to die rather than reveal the location of the stolen Death Star plans.',
Text: 'Deploy on [Vader] Vader.  Vader is landspeed +1.  If Vader about to be lost before the damage segment, he is instead ''hit.''  During battle, may target one opponent''s character present.  Draw destiny. Target ''choked'' (lost) if destiny > ability. (Immune to Alter.)',
